choices: Erza does as he says; it's a lot of jewels!

122.content:
Erza Scarlet, proclaimed as the number one warrior from the Fairy Tail guild, was browsing through the familiar job list on the habitual mission board. The commissions themselves ranged from standard chores to bandit arrests and so forth; nothing that the red-haired combatant hadn't gone through in her experience. Erza was a senior veteran and a unique, yet puissant mage in her own rights, so it wouldn't be staggering that she desired to accomplish a task of her calibre - one that would procure a satisfying price in return. As of then, there weren't many possibilities that met her requirement; the fighter wished to find an errand that stood out of the bunch. The female almost thought of abandoning before feasting her eyes upon a request that caught her attention; an assignment displayed a reward of one million jewels to the one who completed it, an astonishing recompense that she had never witnessed prior to this.

Sneaking a glance at her peers, neither of them seemed that shocked nor captivated by the outstanding employment. If an undertaking such as this contained a payment as unbelievable as this, she was certain that others would at least pay more awareness to it. It didn't appear to be as so, the poster was mainly ignored by the incumbent occupants. Snatching the notice from the plank, Erza began to read its content; a man necessitated assistance in his household not too far from her current location. The bulletin implied that the individual in question desired a woman to aid him in an unspecified matter which he was in no capability to fulfill in his present form. The powerful wizard was initially perplexed at first; why would anyone post an enormous perk for such a trivial affair? Regardless, the money was too excessive to neglect and Erza prepared to head out to the designated whereabouts.

"Wait, Erza-san!" an accustomed voice was heard behind her. A medium-height, slender and blonde figure approached the crimson dame in a slight hurry. The young lady was patently distinguishable as one of her close companions, being none other than the key-user Lucy Heartfilia. The rushing colleen halted for a short instance to recover her energy after her sprint, bending down to accommodate her zonked shape.

"Lucy... what is it? I am in kind of in a hassle as we speak," Erza demanded in her normal, commanding tone. The quicker she finished her labor, the merrier she'll be. The robust servicewoman did not have time to waste by loitering around.

"I'm sorry to bother you, but I noticed how you looked at that job..." the platinum personage gestured to the fabric of paper in the cardinal-pelted gal's disposal. "I should warn you that the customer is very creepy and sort of...uncanny. Not many want to work for him and that's why I wanted to let you know of his character before you left. See you later!" With that being said, Lucy departed - leaving a dazzled wench. She pondered on her friend's description for a short juncture, but shook her head nonetheless. If her client was as disturbed as her comrade stated, it did not matter in any case. If he became disarranged near her, the member would have no dilemma overpowering her assailant. Erza possessed the confidence in her skills and abilities after all - no complications would stand in her way. Although, the adult couldn't suppress a strange consciousness in the back of her mind, as if something heinous would occur during her adventure. Setting her crane straight, she commenced her journey to the bloke's home.

Drawing near the correct residence, the strapping conjuror peered at the little shelter. There wasn't anything extraordinary about it, which made her partially skeptical about the abundance of jewels that were promised from the solicitation. The apartment resembled Lucy's excessively and the environment looked peaceful and harmonious - a trait that reassured her moderately. Marching towards the entrance, Erza rang the doorbell situated on the proximity and awaited the domestic's approval. It didn't take quite long before someone came, unbolting the entry from the adjacent border.

"Hello there, how may I help you?" the middle-aged fellow queried with a friendly demeanor. He was tall - surpassing the broad's height by a foot or two - and was dressed in a conventional attire; a pair of blue jeans and a white t-shirt that matched his bleached socks. The gent retained short curly brown hair with appealing ocean blue peepers. He was quite skinny, if not muscular and seemed overall kind and semi-attractive. The lad was definitely not what she was expecting due to her blonde confidant's comments, but he looked honest and sincere - a characteristic that the singleton could respect.

"Yes, afternoon. I believe you are the one who seeked a helping hand from the Fairy Tail guild?" she retorted politely. "My name is Erza Scarlet, and I hail from the association. I've come to aid you in whatever you desired, in exchange for the large sum that you pledged."

"Ah, I recognize you now. The famous S-Class Mage of Fairy Tail, Erza Scarlet. I am indeed honoured to be in your presence," the male bowed in highlight of one reputed and superior. "You're right, I'm the one who asked for the favor. Please come in." He invited the maiden into his expanse. Settling the damsel in the living room, the chap decided to clarify. "You see, I've recently purchased some items that I'd like to be tested on. I knew that the willing candidates would be slim to none, so I chose to upgrade the perquisite. I got a bit discouraged seeing as no one came to me, that is until you arrived. I am extremely grateful for that and I will keep this short. I've heard that you were one with many armors that you can requip at your control, and I was wondering if you had any that was less...extravagant than that. For my artifacts to function properly, you'll have to wear something comfortable and convenient to adorn."

"Is that so? I believe I have something appropriate..." Erza responded by switching garments. Her wonted imperial panoply was replaced by her japanese clothing; bandages covered her breasts and long trousers with flaming patterns engulfed her lower body. She could have sworn noticing a faint smirk on the opposite being, though dismissed it as an hallucination. Whilst the outfit left her gravely exposed, it was very advantageous as it provided much agility.

"It's...perfect. Please follow me," the unnamed menfolk guided her to his bedroom with glee. The compartment was considerably cramped, yet it had beautiful decorations and his rich origins was tremendously exhibited. His personal room, albeit, was rather dull and plain. A beige contour and wooden floor, accompanied by a masterbed with yellow sheet, followed by a desk and chair, as well as an ethereal abstract painting. Per contra, the mattress was distinctly strange since it had four metal shackles, two in each respective sides. The outlander shut the door as Erza penetrated in its wilderness. "Alright, I'll need you to put your wrists and ankles through those restrains and we'll be ready to start."

Despite his orders, the mage initiated a doubt behind the hombre's true intentions; why did he want her to be repressed in those cuffs? Something very odd was occurring before her very orbs, and she was conflicted in the whole ordeal. The idea of turning back and escaping was very captivating at that moment, but the load of funds was still visible in her mindscape. Erza entailed a decision quickly; the man was patienting for her move.

What will she do?
122.title: Out on a job.

After taking the blame for destroying all the building on her last contract Ezra sat in one of the Council's prison cells. She sat on the prison bench waiting for the time to pass when after a few minutes, a run knight came to the front of her cell.

"Ezra scarlet" he called catching her attention. The magic council have ruled that due to your recent destruction of building that your sentence will not be enough.

Therefore with you as a prisoner of the council and the current need to form an alliance with the dark guilds of this kingdom, the council an agreement to allow them to own you for a few hours securing the alliance between dark guild and the magic council."

Ezra couldn't believe this, it was not enough for her to be in prison for no reason but now she was to be some dark guild plaything for a few hours.

Sadly she did not get time to complain before she was put to sleep and taken before the dark guild member, who had a small bed room for their meeting.

Once there the wizard asked her to lay on the bed before finally getting down to business. The wizard was allowed to tickle Ezra for 2 hour before a guard would get him, however where would he start.

"Noo...heheaahaa 'eep' hahaaha ahahaaaa ok fine hehaahahaha 'squeal' my stomach is ehahahaah aahahahaah ahahahahahaha hahahahaah very ticklish ehahahaha ahahaaaaaahahahahahaa" she conceded.

"Ahh yes, I kind of figured that out already. But I wonder if your belly button is equitably as sensitive?" he rhetorically questions as his lips reached the boundary of her navel. Erza moaned in somewhat pleasure as the wizard placed soothing smooches directly on her crevice. The sentiment was clearly enjoyable for the young warrior.

"Ohh...enjoying this aren't you? Then you'll love this!" he explained as the sorcerer blew a prolonged raspberry straight into her belly orifice, sending tingling sensations down her figure.

"Ugh HAHAAHAHA AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA AHAHAAHAHA WHAT IS THAT? EHAHAHAHA AHAHAHAAHAHA HAAHAHAHA WHAT ARE YOU DOING HEAHAHA ANAYAYAHAHAHA AHAAKAYAAAAAHAHAAHAHAHAAA" Erza squawked from the stimulation.

"These are raspberries my dear! PFFFFTT PFPFFFFFTTT PFFFFFFFPFPFPFPTTTTT, do you like them?" the magician queried as he consistently assaulted his slave's bare umbilical cord. The entity was covered in the man's saliva as he repetitively applied the same technique over and over again, sending the gorgeous beauty into a frenzy.

Massive amount of sweat dripped down her frame as the fellow dragged his nails over her exhausted midriff, arriving at her unprotected pelvis. The individual kneaded her jumpy hips using the lobster claw technique. He grabbed as much skin as possible underneath his palm, gathering it in one place, then releasing it back to its original structure. The effect from the stratagem seemed to do wonders as Erza's laughter increased gargantuously. While one of his meat hook still palpated her waist, the other one jiggled her right flank.

Eventually, the red-haired combatant fell unconscious from the large amount of titillation, her energy having been drained from her body. The man patted her stomach and went to pick up some tools from his bag.

As soon as the girl awoken, the first thing she saw was...
1233.title: Her sides

13.content: Where should Juvia be tickled?
13.title: where is Juvia?

133.content:
Juvia awoke in a dark room, groggy and alone. The bluenette attempted to move and was met with the rattle of chains. Juvia realized she was restrained in the center of the room, her arms tied above her head in a set of handcuffs. She was also seated in a chair, with her socked feet tied to a small stool in front of her.
Just as juvia struggled to free herself, a door opened and a young man in a dark cloak appeared before her. "Hello my dear, I hope you are quite comfortable." Juvia snapped at the man," no, I am not. Why am I here, and who are you?!"
The man smiled, "my name is not important, but I have been hired by Raven Tail to get a little information about fairy tail, and I so happened to see a beautiful woman with the famous logo"
"I will never tell you anything about my friends " juvia shouted.
133.title: Interrogated  by raven tail

141.content: Where does Cana get tickled?
141.title: Where is Cana Alberona?

choices: the Fairy tail guild master's office
142.content: Where does Mirajane get tickled?
142.title: where is Mirajane Strauss?

choices: Wendy is tied upon a tree!
143.content:
A blue haired Dragon Slayer, Wendy, is traveling in the woods alone to complete her quest. From the guild of Fairy Tail, she chooses a mission from the bulletin board. According to the assignment, a gang of thieves have stolen many rare types of loot at midnight. Anyone who attempted ward off the enemy has failed. Therefore, a wizard who uses magic is wanted to defeat these villains and to return the loots. Wendy overhears a rumor that the thieves will steal a dangerous special orb that can steal magic.

As time approaches midnight at nighttime, Wendy is too late. The orb is already stolen. Shadowy figures snoop around in the woods, running away. That must be them! She follows the suspects, using her nose of a Dragon Slayer to sniff them out. Inhaling a large quantity of air into her lungs, “Roar of the Sky Dragon,” she exhales a beam of high pressure wind. The violent vortex of wind creates a path, knocking down the trees and obstacles in its way and alarming the group thieves.

“A wizard?” A cloaked figure signals the other seven figures to go on without him.

“Return the orb back to where it belongs!” Wendy demands.

Pulling an object from his pocket, he reveals a purple orb, glowing with an evil aura, “You’re referring to this, aren’t you? You’ll have to come and get it yourself.”

With no other option, Wendy engages battle. She spread her arms open, “Sky Dragon’s Wing Attack,” and she unleashes a violent whirlwind from both of her arms, twisting and rotating at the target.

“Void magic…” An invisible sphere expands throughout the woods, dispersing Wendy’s attack.

Suddenly, Wendy feels the air in her lungs being forcefully exhaled. There is not a trace of air around her, and she cannot breathe. Everything is dark at night; she couldn’t see her opponent very clear. She tries to speak, “…,” but no sound expels from her voice. Without air for sound to vibrate, sound cannot exist. Wendy hears absolute silence with nothing to inhale. “It’s no use… I can’t breathe. No… I can’t give up. There must be a limit to how far this void exists.” Wendy runs in the opposite direction, away from the castor of this spell. A few steps later, she collapses onto her knees. She feels her mind beginning to shut down, and her vision starts the blur. Tilting aside, she lays unconscious in the middle of the woods.
143.title: The clash of Wind and Void!

choices: To make it up for her, he assists her on escaping!
The entire building is raided by Fairy Tail wizards!
1433.content:
Slowly coming to her senses, Wendy awakens in a dungeon cell underneath the ground. The clean room is completely empty. Tiles of bluish grey marble makes up the floor. The series of rectangular bars made of steel lines up vertically among the locked entrance. Outside of her confinement is a large empty room with a corner that leads to another hallway in which she cannot see. The outside room contains four small lamps, a lamp in each corner which illuminates a dim yellow light. They are the only source of light that allows her to see.

As soon as Wendy attempts to sit up, she feels her wrists being handcuffed together behind her back by thick ropes. Rolling onto her feet, she stands up with little energy and magic within her. “ROAR OF THE…,” she inhales the air around her, “SKY DRAGON!” A puny gust of wind jets out of her mouth in a futile attempt to break the steel bars. Catching her breath, she realizes that it would be better to rest for her magic to return. Stepping to the back corner of the room, she leans her back against the wall to sit down, stretching her legs in front of her. Closing her eyes, she carefully laid her head against the wall beside her to sleep.

A few moments later, something flies into her cell with a clattering noise. Quickly alerted, Wendy notices two small dices rolling towards her to a halt. One dice is black with white dots, and the other dice is red with white dots. Who tossed the dices? She peeks outside of her cell, and a shadow of a human approach towards her in silence. Cowering in fear, she returns back to her corner in her sitting position.

Wendy picks up a young voice, “Pssst! Hey! Could you return the dice back to me?” The girl scrutinizes the figure who wears a dark green cloak with a hood over his head. With her hands being unavailable, she gently kicks the two dices between the bars to the other side.

Bending over, the stranger extends his hand to pick his dices up. He smiles, “Thanks!” Afterwards, he doesn’t seem to have any intention of leaving. Squatting down, he quietly speaks to the captive, “That blue symbol on your right shoulder, you’re from Fairy Tail, aren’t you?”

Wendy slowly nods, not sure of the outcome of her response. The one speaking to her seems to be the same age as Natsu.

“That’s awesome! They’re one of the strongest guilds around.” The unknown stranger holds up his hand, revealing the two dices between his fingers, “You seem lonely in that corner over there. I’m pretty bored myself. Let’s play a game to pass some time. I don’t think the others will do anything to you for a while.” His spare hand shows the dangling keys as he unlocks the barred door to Wendy’s cell.

Wendy is tempted to make a run for it, but she doesn’t have the strength to take down the cloaked boy, especially with her hands tied behind her back.

The cloaked figure finally pulls his hood down, revealing his true face. His most noticeable feature is his messy white hair. Pulling Wendy off the wall, he unexpectedly helps untied to the ropes off her hand, “It’ll be hard to play if you can’t use your hands.”

“… Who are you?” Wendy whispers. A red dice is placed onto her hand.

“Let’s play a game. Whoever rolls the highest number wins. If I lose, I’ll let you free. If I win, you’ll have to play another game with me.”

“Really?” Wendy doesn’t see any risk in his deal. Going first, she quickly rolls her dice. Clattering across the color, the red dice shows four dots on top.

“My turn,” The boy flicks his dice into the air. Bouncing off the ground, the black dice shows up five dots. “Looks like I win. You’re the victim.” Picking up the two dices off the ground, he explains the next game, “The black dice determines the location of where I tickle you, and the red dice determines the amount of time you’ll be tickled.”

Wendy is oblivious to how ticklish she is, and she finds this game rather unorthodox. “Err… Do I have to play this game?” She is given two dices in her hand.

“Please!” He begs, “For the black dice, if it’s a one or a two, then I tickle your armpits. If it’s a three or a four, then I tickle your tummy. If it’s a five or a six, then I tickle your feet. For the red dice, each dot represents five minutes!”

“How will you keep track of the time?” Wendy curiously asks.

The cloaked figure pulls his sleeve to show the watch on his wrist, “I can just set the time. It’ll beep when the time is up.” He gestures her, “Go on and roll the dice!”

Dropping the two colored dices, they clatter across the room and reveal Wendy’s fate. The black dice reveals a three, and the red dice reveals a four! In other words, Wendy will be tickled on her tummy for twenty minutes.
Setting his watch for twenty minutes, he immediately pounce the girl to the ground and begins wiggling his fingers on her sides.

Inevitably, Wendy giggles cutely with a little blush on her cheeks, “Hehehahahahahahahahaha!” She feels a total loss in control of her body. Her arms naturally try to push the tickling hand off her by reflex as her legs are kicking uncontrollably, “Ahahahahahahaha! Stop! Hehahahahahaha! No! Hahahahehahahaha!” The pair of whimsical hands continues to dance wildly around her sensitive tummy.

On the halfway mark of ten minutes, the level of tickling steps up a notch as the pair of hands slips under the skirt of her sleeveless dress. Once the fingers make contact to the bare tender skin of her belly, Wendy laughs even louder, “KYA! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! NO! HYAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” The little Dragon Slayer squirms and rolls on the ground as her midsection is being provoked in an unusual manner. A teardrop leaks from her closed eyes from the experience.

At the final five minutes, she explodes into laughter when her bellybutton is touched,
“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Streams of tears flow from her eyes from the anguish, KYAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! MAKE IT STOP! AHAHAHAHAHA! HEHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

At last, the watch beeps. The boy stops and wipes the tears off Wendy’s face, “Are you okay?”

Curling defensively into a ball, Wendy gasps for air to catch her breath while panting. As a Sky Dragon Slayer, she is granted with the power to eat air itself to rejuvenate faster than others.
1433.title: The Dice Tickle Game!

14521.content:
Levy was hard at work studying once again in the fairy tail library wearing her usual clothing of a orange summer dress and brown flip-flops as he goes from one bookshelf to another.

"Hmm maybe its here?" Levy says moving herself to the next huge book filled book case. Being small as she is Levy had a little trouble with reaching books and while she was busy trying to reach a new book to continue her studying she didn't notice..
14521.title: Library study

145212.content: Who else could it be?
145212.title: Other choices

choices: In a room with feet in stocks and arms tied behind back
In a hallway with arms handcuffed above head to staircase
1452121.content:
"Aha!" Levy grinned, pulling down her book from the shelf. As she did, a strange woman wearing a cloak entered the library. Levy was too busy getting settled in to read, however, to notice. The woman walked out of sight, behind the bookshelf that Levy had just been at. Then, she walked back out, whistling as she exited the library.

"That was interesting." Thought the 17 year old Fairy as she walked to put the book back. As the book slid into its groove, it pushed something, causing a click. "What was that?" Thought Levy. Then, she heard a hissing noise. Then, she smelled something sharp. After she did, her eyelids shut instantly and she was out cold on the floor.







Where does she wake up?
1452121.title: A strange, unrecognized woman

14521212.content:
McGarden's eyes blink open.
"What the? Where am I?" the Fairy thinks, feeling like she just had a long, deep sleep. She tries to stretch, then realizes her wrists are in a set of cold metal handcuffs. Those are then looped through a hole between two posts on a staircase. Another pair holds her ankles together. Levy looked around, noticing that she appears to be trapped in a house.
"What's going on...?" the blue haired girl wonders. Then, the door of the house opens. The same strange, unrecognized woman enters, hood stil on.
"Hey!", Levy says, "I remember you!" She hadn't paid much attention to the woman before, but now she remembered.
"What did you do to me?" the Fairy demands, pulling on her handcuffs.
"Nothing personal, McGarden, just my job," she replies, stepping closer to the squirming girl. For the first time, Levy notices the feather strapped to her cloak.
"What job? And how did you know my name?" The woman pulls out the feather, saying,
"Not important. However, do know that we don't want anything specifically from you. "
"Then what fo you want?" Levy asks, more confused than ever. Instead of responding, the woman simply brushes the feather on McGarden's nose.

         The Fairy blinks, twisting her face to the side.
"Stop that!" she protests. The woman ignores her, instead lighty wiggling the white feather on the hazel eyed Fairy's pale neck. Levy smiled, the feather tickled her neck a bit, but then immediately choked it back, replacing it with a look of anger.
"Get away from me!" she demands, not getting any reaction from the mysterious, yet creepy woman. The woman instead brings the feather even lower, right into McGarden's underarm. She tests the girl's pit with a quick stroke of the feather, and is not disappointed. The girl yelps, then tries to pull her hands out of the cuffs to prevent the tickling. She quickly stops though when the woman begins brushing the feather in her left armpit. Rather, her girly laughes carry down the hallway. The woman smiles behind her hood, knowing her boss will be pleased. Levy continues to giggle and squirm in absolute ticklishness. The pale skin of her underarms is outrageously ticklish, and her dress was not helping to protect it. She shrieks when her tickler finally drops the feather and instead uses two fingers to tease her two underarms. The woman can't help but enjoy herself a little, the Fairy that she tortures is just so cute and ticklish. Levy was not enjoying herself, however, especially when the woman began pressing her fingers into her armpits. She howled with laughter, straining with everything in her to pull her hands ftom her restraints. The torture continues for another five minutes, which leaves Levy panting and red faced. What now?
14521212.title: Right Under The Arms

info.brief_description: Tickle the girls of Fairy Tail
info.description:
The girls of fairy tail get into ticklish situations.

Rules: No sex or violence.
